nodes.text: Ordo was a Mandalorian world located within the galaxy. The planet was home to the Archaic Arsenal, which housed an ancient Mandalorian rally master lance.

During the reign of the Galactic Empire, crime lord Dryden Vos of the Crimson Dawn syndicate had the rally master lance stolen for his private collection. For a while, Ordo suspected the people of Krownest―a fellow Mandalorian-inhabited world―of the artifact's theft, though the Scabbard Monument of Krownest had also found itself burglarized by Dryden Vos around the same time.

The planet Ordo was first introduced to the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, written by Pablo Hidalgo. Ordo originated years prior, having been mentioned in the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic video game and further detailed in the Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide.
